thread.title: Gotham Season 3 Winter Finale Photos Released
thread.title_full: Gotham Season 3 Winter Finale Photos Released

author: Jay Jayson
title: Gotham Season 3 Winter Finale Photos Released
text:
Gotham Season 3 Winter Finale Photos Released Jay Jayson Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Before Gotham goes on hiatus until April 24, FOX will air its winter finale this Monday. Now you can check out official stills from the upcoming episode, which is titled “The Gentle Art of Making Enemies.” 
They feature our first look at James Remar ( Warriors, Django Unchained ) as Jim Gordon's estranged uncle, Frank Gordon. "Frank Gordon became estranged to Jim after the boy’s father died in a car crash, but now he is back to reconnect with his nephew," Variety explained. "However, Frank has some secrets of his own, and one of them will threaten Jim’s worldview. The secret’s revelation will force Jim to decide what’s more important: his family or his city. 
Aside from that, we also see Harvey, Jim, and Alfred teaming up once again to save Bruce. The young billionaire was abducted and taken to a carnical by the newly-resurrected Jerome and his neo-Maniax . 
With Jerome (guest star Cameron Monaghan) on the loose with one target in mind, Bruce and Alfred's safety is compromised. Meanwhile, Gordon’s uncle Frank (guest star James Remar) pays him a visit, and ‎Nygma and Penguin are forced to confront their issues face-to-face, with possible deadly consequences. 
The regular cast features Ben McKenzie as Detective James Gordon, Donal Logue as Harvey Bullock, David Mazouz as Bruce Wayne, Morena Baccarin as Leslie Thompkins, Sean Pertwee as Alfred, Robin Lord Taylor as Oswald Cobblepot/The Penguin, Erin Richards as Barbara Kean, Camren Bicondova as Selina Kyle/the future Catwoman, Cory Michael Smith as Edward Nygma/the future Riddler, Jessica Lucas as Tabitha Galavan, Chris Chalk as Lucius Fox, Drew Powell as Butch Gilzean, Maggie Geha as the future Poison Ivy, Michael Chiklis as Detective Nathaniel Barnes, and Benedict Samuel as Mad Hatter. 
The all-new “The Gentle Art of Making Enemies” winter finale episode of Gotham airing Monday, January 30 at 8:00-9:01 PM ET/PT on FOX.
